Name: Excluding social security payments and supplemental security income from the definition of “income” for the purposes of determining eligibility under the senior citizen rent increase exemption (SCRIE). (S.1152/A.3218)
Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.1152/A.3218, in relation to excluding social security payments and supplemental security income from the definition of “income” for the purposes of determining eligibility under the senior citizen rent increase exemption (SCRIE)

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
This Resolution was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Aging
